name: POGOLORD
description:
A simple 3-day high-score arcade game about pogoing, killing enemies, and beating levels.

FEATURES:

- Simple rhythm-like bouncing

- Infinite difficulty scaling

- 2 enemy types

- Difficult but skillful gameplay

A and D to move

Space to pogo

Mouse to aim, M1 to fire

F1 to fullscreen

M to mute

Have fun :)
